overview: Women are always about “drama, drama, drama”. It only gets doubled when they're all lesbians! Steamy passionate lesbian sex scenes punctuate the drama that permeates the lives of eight women, all connected via life and lust. In the 19th edition of this staggering Sapphic series, the sex is realistic and the drama is dramatic!
tagline: Drama to the highest degree!  Tainted passion turns to obsessed lust!
title: Lesbian PsychoDramas 19
